title: Shotlist
description: Generated from 02-dictionary/artifacts/shotlist_ENRICHED.md. Art Director's index of illustration slots for a slice, linking each slot to its Art Plan while keeping player-facing surfaces safe.

edited.description: Date this shotlist was last edited.

owner.description: Role maintaining the shotlist; fixed to Art Director.

scope.description: Player-safe slice description (1-2 lines) detailing which sections this shotlist covers.

dormancy.description: Dormancy state, including deferral tagging when plan-only.

snapshot.description: Cold snapshot reference in format "Cold @ YYYY-MM-DD".

tu.description: Origin TU Brief identifier in format TU-YYYY-MM-DD-<role><seq>.

neighbors.description: Roles affected by this shotlist; must include illustrator, style, translator, binder, and gatekeeper.

purpose_mix.description: Purpose distribution summary (counts for clarify, recall, mood, signpost) matching the slot table.

inclusion_policy.description: Player-safe summary of where images appear within the slice.

accessibility_summary.description: Slice-level accessibility confirmation covering captions and alt text readiness.

slots.description: Table of art slots, one per planned illustration, with player-safe surface content.

slot_id.description: Kebab-case slot identifier that links to the Art Plan.

art_plan_reference.description: Relative path or identifier for the corresponding Art Plan artifact.

purpose.description: Primary art purpose for this slot.

subject.description: Short subject description using concrete nouns.

focal_affordance.description: What must remain readable or legible in the composition.

caption.description: Player-safe caption shown to players (single line).

alt_text.description: Player-safe alt text (one sentence covering subject, relation, and location).

anchor_targets.description: List of manuscript paths anchored by this slot.

status.description: Current production status for the slot.

inclusion_exclusion_rules.description: Optional notes capturing any non-obvious placement rules for specific slots.

localization_style_notes.description: Slice-level localization and style guidance bullets that align with Style Addendum and Codex entries.

accessibility_checklist.description: Accessibility checklist items that must be confirmed before handoff.

binder_note.description: Binder instructions for anchor verification and dry bind planning.

hooks_filed.description: Optional follow-up hooks filed from this shotlist.

done_checklist.description: Completion checklist verifying readiness before handing off to the illustrator.

quality_bar.description: One of 8 Quality Bars (see taxonomies.md ยง5)

loop_name.description: One of 13 TU loop types (see taxonomies.md ยง3 and loop_names.md)

deferral_tag.description: Deferral type for dormant roles (see taxonomies.md ยง7)
